name: Trumpet
description: A brass instrument with 3 valves. Can be a very loud instrument.

name: Trombone
description: A brass instrument with a slide. Has a bigger mouthpiece than a trumpet.

name: Clarinet
description: A reed instrument with many keys. Can make squeak noises if not played properly.

name: Flute
description: A woodwind instrument that takes a lot of air to make a good sound. Very light.

name: Tuba
description: A brass instrument that takes a lot of air to make a good sound. Very heavy.

name: Guitar
description: A string instrument. There are many different types like acoustic and electric.

name: Saxophone
description: A reed instrument that is used a lot in jazz.

name: French Horn
description: A brass instrument with a very small mouthpiece. Can be difficult to hit the appropriate interval when playing.

name: Triangle
description: An instrument that isn't used too often.

name: Drums
description: A very loud instrument. Your feet can also be used when playing the drums.
